tool_description: Short.cm API allows you to make short URLs from your application
name: Short.cm Link Management
title: Short.cm Link Management

api_list.name: List domains
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://a-kostenko-short-cm-link-management-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "a-kostenko-short-cm-link-management-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
